name: DunHero
description:
Welcome! Play DunHero and go on a big adventure. You will walk through a large, changing World. You must fight and win against all enemies and powerful bosses you find.

Pick a hero to start your journey. Each hero has different starting items and strengths. The deeper you go, the more things you find to help you and the stronger you get.

In Dunhero, something new is always waiting for you - like a secret room, a strong item, or a hard bad guy.

DunHero in a nutshell

  • Over 150 Unique Items
  • 8 Playable Characters
  • 3 Worlds with their bosses and enemies
  • And more coming in further updates...

Play With Your Friends!

Gather a team of 2-4 players and enjoy Multiplayer CO-OP experience.

Fight your Enemies!

Fun combat system. You have to defeat all enemies and bosses.

Find Powerful Items

In DunHero there is a lot of amazing Legendary items to find and use.

Pick Your Hero!

You can play many heroes, each with different starting Items and strengths.

Procedurally Generated Maps!

The world and dungeons changes each time you play. So none of the gameplay will be the same!

Many Enemies

Lots of different enemies and powerful bosses to fight.

Come play Dunhero - every game is a new fun adventure!
